The claim made by President Donald Trump: 2. The statement from the Aviation Safety Network (ASN) reporting 10 fatal accidents in 2017, half of which were cargo flights, resulting in 79 deaths.
The confirmation that there have been no: S. commercial airline accidents since 2009 and none from foreign air carriers in the U.S. since 2013.
The acknowledgment that there were some: prop plane or cargo plane accidents in 2017, as reported by both the ASN and Dutch aviation consulting firm To70.
